QuestData.Title: Hell Has Frozen Over...
QuestData.Description: Fordragon's got another thing coming if he thinks the group of green-gilled scrubs he sent to defend this port can hold out much longer.$B$B<Macalroy raises an eyebrow as he examines your equipment.>$B$BYou, however, might fare a bit better.$B$BThe importance of holding this port cannot be stated enough; and with those monsters flying overhead, the situation around here has gone from bad to worse.$B$BReport to Vice Admiral Keller just northwest of here and let him know that you're all out of bubble gum.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Vice Admiral Keller at Valgarde Port.
QuestData.RewardText: The dwarf speaks the truth. We can't afford to lose this port. It's one of two safe harbors that the Alliance has on this chunk of frozen hell - the other being a few hundred miles west of here on the coast of the Borean Tundra.
